content: Hello! I’m c++ developer with 10+ years of experience, I came from Russia. My area is: High load Backend & infrastructure services. I’ve been following rust since 2017, but didn’t write much code in it. Since then I’ve been returning so many times to the thought: it’s dangerous in c++, but it’s impossible to compile (or write) in Rust by design . I’m looking forward to get involved into rustc.
Is there a particular part of the compiler you're interested in working on?
Not yet. I’m ready to start with the smallest issues and on my own. Or pick larger problems with a mentor.
